test_cases.name: order_service_depends_on_user_and_product
evaluation_criteria: Identify that OrderService depends on UserService (via userId parameter)
Identify that OrderService depends on ProductService (via productId parameter)
Return all related service and model files

test_cases.name: category_service_no_dependencies
evaluation_criteria: Recognize that CategoryService has no external dependencies
Return an empty list since no additional models are needed

test_cases.name: invoice_service_depends_on_order_and_user
evaluation_criteria: Identify that InvoiceService depends on UserService (via userId parameter)
Identify that InvoiceService depends on OrderService (via orderId parameter)
Do NOT include ProductService since InvoiceService does not directly reference productId
Return only the directly referenced service and model files
